name: Easy & Healthy Fried Rice Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: sesame oil, garlic, chicken breast, salt, pepper, carrot, broccoli floret, brown rice, frozen peas, low sodium soy sauce
recipeInstructionSteps: Heat sesame oil in a skillet, and cook garlic until softened.
Add the chicken, salt, and pepper, and sauté for 5 minutes.
Add the carrots and broccoli, and sauté until tender.
Add the rice, soy sauce, and peas, and mix thoroughly.
